title: FPVSIM Drone Simulator
description: FPVSIM is an FPV Drone simulator that combines realistic drone simulation with great stick feel and great graphics. It boasts a high precision quadrotor dynamics simulation engine, designed for scientific research and fine-tuned by veteran drone racers.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# FPVSIM Drone Simulator 2
<!--text-->
Official website https://fpvsim.com.

FPVSIM is an FPV Drone simulator that combines realistic drone simulation with great stick feel and great graphics. It boasts a high precision quadrotor dynamics simulation engine, designed for scientific research and fine-tuned by veteran drone racers to deliver the most realistic stick feel possible.

FPVSIM 2 just dropped too! Offering the next level drone physics simulation with more maps and features! And at a lower price too – $7.19, with a release discount of 20% off! Some highlights of FPVSIM 2

✔️ A fully revamped quadrotor dynamics simulation engine with realistic propeller and motor simulations, pushing simulation accuracy and stick feel to the next level
✔️ Added 6 brand new maps, making a total offering of 15 maps! Some of them are specifically tailored for medium to lower end PCs. New maps are:
    ✔️ Asian Medieval Town
    ✔️ Drifting Scene: a frequently asked feature, now added to the portfolio
    ✔️ City Park
    ✔️ Harbor Party
    ✔️ Desert Track
    ✔️ Secret Base
✔️ Added toggleable realtime stick overlay, make it it easier to see how certain tricks are done
✔️ Added throttle limit configurations, allowing you to configure throttle limit in the sim
✔️ Added max deg/s to rate configurator, making it easier to see the current rate
✔️ Added Level/angle mode on top of Acro mode, the same as Betaflight Angle mode, great for beginners
✔️ Auto hide and show floating buttons and cursor: move or left click the mouse to reveal
✔️ Add altitude and flight mode info to HUD
✔️ New inflatable gate and flag models
✔️ Fine tuned propeller sound
✔️ Polish HUD and loading screen
✔️ Add instructions for car driving scene
✔️ Fixed a bug where updating drone settings occasionally crashes the sim
✔️ etc.


Want to FPV anywhere in the world or prepare for a commercial flight in another city? You can now fly FPVSIM in Google 3D Map: 

- https://youtu.be/x89Y_PZF50o?t=365
- https://youtu.be/ZWwOtcqjZ7w  

Want to do some crazy building dive? Try the FPVSIM Matrix City map: 

- https://youtu.be/5VZwbgcweW0

FPVSIM offers a variety of features, such as:

- Accurate physics simulation
- Support for a wide range of input devices such as gamepads and radio controllers
- An online editor at fpvsim.com/sim for creating custom tracks
- Google Maps integration allowing you to FPV anywhere around the world
- Drifting scenes (coming soon)
- 3D graphics with high-quality textures
- A lite web based version at fpvsim.com/sim that allows to play from almost anywhere

FPVSIM is a great FPV simulator for pilots of all skill levels, from beginners to experts. It is a great way to learn the basics of flying FPV drones, practice flying in different environments, and prepare for races.
